description: Demo-only simulator for scholarship eligibility on the National Scholarship Portal, combining rule-based checks with a simple ML probability estimate.

benefit_amount.notes: Illustrative scholarship amount used only for this hackathon project.

fairness_policy.interpretation: Differences in approval rates between monitored groups beyond 10 percentage points should trigger a fairness WARN or FAIL.

ethical_disclaimer: This NSP module is a hackathon demonstration. It is not affiliated with the official National Scholarship Portal and must not be used to make real scholarship decisions. All rules are simplified for educational purposes.
